Package src.Controller

Class MacronutrientControl

java.lang.Object
src.Controller.MacronutrientControl
public class MacronutrientControl extends Object
The MacronutrientControl class is responsible for calculating the daily caloric needs, macronutrient percentages, and macronutrient amounts for a given user profile. It includes methods for calculating basal metabolic rate (BMR), total daily energy expenditure (TDEE), adjusting TDEE for weight gain/loss goals, and calculating macronutrient amounts based on a user's caloric needs and desired carbohydrate percentage. It also includes a method for setting the user's activity level.

  • Method Details

    • calculateBmr

      public int calculateBmr(double weight, double height, int age, String sex)
      Calculates the basal metabolic rate (BMR) for a given user profile.
      Parameters:
      weight - the user's weight in kilograms
      height - the user's height in centimeters
      age - the user's age in years
      sex - the user's biological sex ("Male" or "Female")
      Returns:
      the user's BMR as an integer

    • calculateTdee

      public int calculateTdee(int bmr, String activityLevel)
      Calculates the total daily energy expenditure (TDEE) for a given user profile and activity level.
      Parameters:
      bmr - the user's BMR
      activityLevel - the user's activity level ("Sedentary", "Light Exercise(1-2/Week)", "Moderate Exercise(3-5/Week)", "Heavy Exercise(6-7/Week)", or "Athlete(2x/Day)")
      Returns:
      the user's TDEE as an integer

    • adjustTdeeForGoal

      public int adjustTdeeForGoal(int tdee, String goal)
      Adjust TDEE based on weight goal, and calculate macronutrient requirements based on calorie intake and desired carbohydrate amount.
      Parameters:
      tdee - the total daily energy expenditure
      goal - the weight goal ("Weight Gain", "Weight Loss", or "Maintain Weight")
      Returns:
      the adjusted TDEE as an integer

    • calculateMacronutrients

      public Macronutrients calculateMacronutrients(int calories, String carbAmount)
      Calculates macronutrient requirements based on the number of calories and preferred carb amount.
      Parameters:
      calories - the total calorie intake
      carbAmount - the preferred carbohydrate amount ("Low", "Medium", or "High")
      Returns:
      a Macronutrients object containing the calculated macronutrient amounts

    • setActivityLevel

      public void setActivityLevel(String activityLevel)
      Sets the activity level.
      Parameters:
      activityLevel - the activity level to set
